name: text-tweak
description: text-tweak is your go-to toolkit for hassle-free string casing formatting in JavaScript/TypeScript. With a suite of intuitive functions, you can effortlessly convert text between various casing styles, whether it's lowercase, UPPERCASE, Title Case, camelCase, snake_case, kebab-case, PascalCase, or even your custom styles!

scripts.build: tsup && git add . && git commit -m 'auto- build updated' && git push

author: Ashish
